prompt_base: powerful asian fusion warrior, hyper-muscular physique, intense determined eyes, short spiky black hair, confident stern expression, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: individual hair strands visible, extreme muscle definition, realistic fabric texture on blue gi, subtle power aura effect, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, flat lighting, low quality, blurry clothes, simple design, (weak:1.2), friendly face
